project_descr: This project focuses on strengthening the disaster management system in Lesotho and effective management of the impact of disaster risks within the context of sustainable development.

outputs.output_descr: This project focuses on strengthening the disaster management system in Lesotho and effective management of the impact of disaster risks within the context of sustainable development.

document_name: Enhancing National and Local Capacity in Disaster Risk Reduction in Lesotho
project_title: strengthning capacity disaster risk reduction in lesotho
